memberdef.name: TCS34725_ENABLE_WEN
memberdef.initializer: (0x08) /* Wait enable - Writing 1 activates the wait timer */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_ENABLE_AEN
memberdef.initializer: (0x02) /* RGBC Enable - Writing 1 actives the ADC, 0 disables it */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_ENABLE_PON
memberdef.initializer: (0x01) /* Power on - Writing 1 activates the internal oscillator, 0 disables it */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS
memberdef.initializer: (0x0C) /* Persistence register - basic SW filtering mechanism for interrupts */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_NONE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0000) /* Every RGBC cycle generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_1_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0001) /* 1 clean channel value outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_2_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0010) /* 2 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_3_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0011) /* 3 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_5_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0100) /* 5 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_10_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0101) /* 10 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_15_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0110) /* 15 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_20_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b0111) /* 20 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_25_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1000) /* 25 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_30_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1001) /* 30 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_35_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1010) /* 35 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_40_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1011) /* 40 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_45_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1100) /* 45 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_50_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1101) /* 50 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_55_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1110) /* 55 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_PERS_60_CYCLE
memberdef.initializer: (0b1111) /* 60 clean channel values outside threshold range generates an interrupt */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_CONFIG_WLONG
memberdef.initializer: (0x02) /* Choose between short and long (12x) wait times via TCS34725_WTIME */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_CONTROL
memberdef.initializer: (0x0F) /* Set the gain level for the sensor */

memberdef.name: TCS34725_STATUS_AVALID
memberdef.initializer: (0x01) /* Indicates that the RGBC channels have completed an integration cycle */
